import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { Tableau } from "../tableau"; @Component({ selector: "app-qlqstableaux", templateUrl: "./qlqstableaux.component.html", styleUrls: ["./qlqstableaux.component.css"], }) export class QlqstableauxComponent { currentDate: Date = new Date(); tableaux: Tableau[] = [ new Tableau( "La persistance de la mémoire", "assets/Tabs/t3.jpg", "Salvador Dali", 1850, "surrealisme" ), new Tableau( "Guernica", "assets/Tabs/t1.jpg", "Pablo Picasso", 3200, "surrealisme" ), new Tableau( "La corbeille de pommes", "assets/Tabs/t2.jpg", "Paul Cézanne", 2400, "post impressionisme" ), ]; }

Ventes aux enchères du: {{ currentDate | date:'* dd * MMMM * yyyy *' }}
